title: ISO Week Toolbox
description: Look up ISO week numbers, date ranges, and upcoming weeks in seconds.

status.invalidDate: Select a valid date to see ISO week details.
status.invalidWeek: Enter a valid ISO year and week (1-53).

dateToWeek.title: Date → ISO Week
dateToWeek.description: Convert a date to ISO week number, ISO year, and week range.
dateToWeek.helper: ISO weeks start on Monday and week 1 contains the first Thursday.

weekToRange.title: ISO Week → Date Range
weekToRange.description: Get the Monday-Sunday range for a given ISO year and week.

weekList.title: Upcoming ISO Weeks
weekList.description: Preview a list of ISO weeks starting from a base date.
weekList.empty: Choose a base date to list weeks.

openGraph.title: ISO Week Toolbox
openGraph.description: Free ISO week utility: convert dates to ISO weeks, find week ranges, and preview upcoming weeks instantly.
